> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Damnit. I haven’t done that much—material gathering and some hunting.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: How long has it been? Am I literally dead IRL?
> [[ Ayla ]]: That’s exactly the problem
> [[ Ayla ]]: It hasn’t been that long at all.
> [[ Ayla ]]: I’m tired as shit but I’m logging back on because something isn’t right
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Are you okay?
> [[ Ayla ]]: Remember the first time the game updated?
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Yeah, I lost a whole fucking day and woke up with the worst headache.
> [[ Ayla ]]: And when the gunner from our raid logged off to ‘get a snack’?
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Vyx?
> [[ Ayla ]]: She was confused when we had to wait like, half an hour for her to get back on.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: The game updated again pretty recently.
> [[ Ayla ]]: I think it’s swung back the other way.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: I actually had some other things to talk to you about.
> [[ Ayla ]]: Related to this?
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: No.
> [[ Ayla ]]: Where are you?
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: City square.
> [[ Ayla ]]: On my way.

“Tats, are you feeling tired?” You ask, making a ‘pillow’ gesture with clasped hands. “Sleepy?”

“N-no.” She shakes her head.

Ayla’s got you worried. You’ll have to investigate yourself. But, right now…

“Celestials, listen up.” As you speak, a light is born in the statue’s eyes. “Grant me the power to remember my enemies, that their memory might stand with me as I face still stronger foes—so I might borrow from their knowledge or strength.”

> [[ To forget history is to repeat it. ]]
> [[ Time heals – yet, time erases. ]]
> [[ To circumvent this truth is no simple task. ]]
> [[ If you believe yourself worthy, return to us four gifts, and we will make your desire manifest. ]]

> [[ Continued ]]
name: BSO
